metadata.title: CVE-2021-29973 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: Password autofill was enabled without user interaction on insecure websiteson Firefox for Android. This was corrected to require user interaction withthe page before a user's password would be entered by the browser'sautofill functionality *This bug only affects Firefox for Android. Otheroperating systems are unaffected.*. This vulnerability affects Firefox <90.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
